#program 2113  10 RUN AT 3  20 LAYER 2,1  30 PAPER 182  40 CLEAR 49151  50 BANK 0 ERASE 0,16384  60 DIM z(14): FOR n=1 TO 14: READ z(n): NEXT n  70 DATA 0,2,160,162,20,22,180,3,224,231,28,31,252,255  80 PRINT PAPER 0; INK 255;"AoC 2021.13 Origami             "  90 FOR n=0 TO 7 100 INK 224: PLOT 208+n,7-n: DRAW 7,0: INK 252: DRAW 8,0: INK 28: DRAW 8,0: INK 31: DRAW 8,0: INK 0 110 NEXT n 120 PLOT 4,28: DRAW 96,0: DRAW 0,32: DRAW -96,0: DRAW 0,-32 130 PRINT AT 3,1;"Unfolded" 140 PRINT AT 5,13;">"; 150 PLOT 116,28: DRAW 56,0: DRAW 0,32: DRAW -56,0: DRAW 0,-32 160 PRINT AT 3,15;"Folded"; 170 PLOT 188,28: DRAW 62,0: DRAW 0,32: DRAW -62,0: DRAW 0,-32 180 PRINT AT 3,24;"Part 1" 190 PLOT 4,84: DRAW 246,0: DRAW 0,68: DRAW -246,0: DRAW 0,-68 200 PRINT AT 10,1;"Part 2"; 210 DIM f(12,2) 220 RESTORE %1470 230 FOR i=1 TO 12 240 READ f$: LET j=1 250 IF f$(j)<>"=" THEN LET j=j+1: GO TO %250 260 IF f$(j-1)="x" THEN LET f(i,1)= VAL (f$(j+1 TO )): LET f(i,2)=65535: GO TO %280 270 LET f(i,1)= 65535: LET f(i,2)= VAL (f$(j+1 TO )) 280 NEXT i 290 RESTORE %570 300 LET c=0 310 READ x,y 320 IF x=-1 THEN PRINT AT 21,0;: STOP  330 PRINT AT 5,2;x;",";y;"  "; 340 FOR i=1 TO 12 350 LET fx=f(i,1): LET fy=f(i,2) 360 IF x>fx THEN LET x=2*fx-x 370 IF y>fy THEN LET y=2*fy-y 380 IF i=1 THEN GO SUB %470 390 NEXT i 400 INK z(1+ INT ( RND *14)) 410 FOR i=0 TO 4 420 PLOT 12+6*x,100+6*y+i: DRAW 4,0 430 NEXT i 440 INK 0 450 PRINT AT 5,16;x;",";y;" "; 460 GO TO %310 470 LET %x=x: LET %y=y 480 LET %a=%49152+y*4 490 IF %a<49152 THEN LET %a=%a-16384 500 REM PRINT AT 0,16;%a; 510 LET %p=% DPEEK (a) 520 REM PRINT AT 1,17;%p;"  "; 530 IF %p=0 THEN DPOKE %a,%y: DPOKE %a+2,%x: LET c=c+1: PRINT AT 5,25;c;: RETURN  540 IF %p<>y THEN LET %a=%a+404: GO TO %490 550 IF % DPEEK (a+2)<>x THEN LET %a=%a+404: GO TO %490 560 RETURN  570 DATA 23,123,1116,117,60,18,954,323,1235,226,1123,599,862,231,808,11,982,687,574,248 580 DATA 1041,449,584,105,408,575,594,466,1058,677,23,33,127,862,1305,367,87,220,194,855 590 DATA 706,455,550,241,750,493,922,616,88,861,682,822,487,359,1208,555,579,674,1097,266 600 DATA
